meanings.definition: In a splendid or impressive manner.
meanings.sent1: The fireworks display lit up the night sky magnificently.
meanings.sent2: She sang magnificently at the talent show.
meanings.sent3: The puppy tried to bark magnificently, but it came out as a squeak.
meanings.sent4: The sun set magnificently, painting the sky in hues of pink and orange.
meanings.sent5: The castle stood magnificently on top of the hill, a symbol of power and beauty.

meanings.definition: To a great extent or degree.
meanings.sent1: She magnificently completed her homework before dinner.
meanings.sent2: The team magnificently won the championship.
meanings.sent3: The cat magnificently napped for hours on the cozy blanket.
meanings.sent4: His speech magnificently moved the audience to tears.
meanings.sent5: The storm magnificently raged outside, shaking the windows with its force.
